Ner'zhul.bio: Ner'zhul was an orc shaman who became the first Lich King after being bound to the Frozen Throne by Kil'jaeden.

Arthas Menethil.bio: Arthas was a prince of Lordaeron and paladin of the Silver Hand who fell from grace and merged with Ner'zhul to become the Lich King.

Sylvanas Windrunner.bio: Once a ranger-general of Silvermoon, Sylvanas was slain by Arthas and turned into a banshee. She later broke free and formed the Forsaken.

Jaina Proudmoore.bio: Jaina is a powerful human mage and ruler of the city-state of Theramore. She has been a key figure in many conflicts, including the Third War and the recent faction war.

Thrall.bio: Thrall, also known as Go'el, was the former warchief of the Horde and a key figure in the events of Warcraft III and World of Warcraft.

Gul'dan.bio: Gul'dan was a powerful orc warlock who played a key role in the corruption of the orcs and the opening of the Dark Portal.

Illidan Stormrage.bio: Illidan is a night elf who consumed the Skull of Gul'dan and gained demonic powers. He has been both an ally and enemy of Azeroth.

Varian Wrynn.bio: Varian was the high king of the Alliance and ruler of Stormwind. He played a key role in the faction war and the events of the Cataclysm.

Anduin Wrynn.bio: Anduin is the son of Varian Wrynn and the current king of Stormwind. He is known for his pacifist nature and diplomatic skills.

Tyrande Whisperwind.bio: Tyrande is the high priestess of the moon goddess Elune and the leader of the night elves. She has been a key figure in many conflicts, including the War of the Ancients and the recent faction war.

Malfurion Stormrage.bio: Malfurion is the archdruid of the night elves and the husband of Tyrande Whisperwind. He played a key role in the War of the Ancients and the recent faction war.

Sargeras.bio: Sargeras is the dark titan who created the Burning Legion and seeks to destroy all life in the universe. He was once a noble champion of order before being corrupted by the void.

Kil'jaeden.bio: Kil'jaeden is one of the leaders of the Burning Legion and a key figure in the corruption of the orcs and the invasion of Azeroth.

Archimonde.bio: Archimonde is one of the leaders of the Burning Legion and a key figure in the invasion of Azeroth. He was defeated by the combined forces of the Alliance and Horde at the Battle of Mount Hyjal.
